data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Textile and Garmenting Policy 2022 - Incentive Relating to Energy - New
data.benefits: The scheme provides upto 100% exemption from electricity duty for a period of 10 years.
data.eligibility: The unit must be an existing textile or garmenting unit in Uttar Pradesh.
data.beneficiaries:
The unit must be an existing textile or garmenting unit in Uttar Pradesh.

The unit must undertake expansion or diversification with:
A minimum of 25% additional investment in new plant and machinery.
An increase in installed capacity by at least 25%.

The land must be purchased from government agencies or authorities in designated industrial areas.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Textile, Department of Textile
data.context: The Uttar Pradesh Textile and Garmenting Policy 2022 aims to boost the textile and garment industry in the state. It was introduced to attract investments, create jobs, and position Uttar Pradesh as a leading hub for textile and apparel manufacturing.
data.objective:
a) Attract investment in the textile and apparel sector to the tune of Rs. 10,000 Crore. 

b) Generate employment opportunity for 5 lakh persons.

c) Development of five (05) Textile and Apparel Parks through private sector. 

d) 50% increase in earnings of Handloom and Power loom weavers.

e) Modernization of power looms and their operation through solar energy. 

f) Increase production of silk yarn in the state.
data.description:
100% exemption from electricity duty will be given to the new textile and garmenting units for a period of 10 years.

Electricity produced by new textile and garmenting units, from Captive Power Plants and used for self-consumption, will be exempted from electricity duty for a period of 10 years.
data.how_to_apply: Scheme can be applied through Nivesh Mitra Portal of Uttar Pradesh Government
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Textile, Department of Textile
data.funding_mechanism: The beneficiary will get the benefit after the approval of application by the funding facilitator.
data.highlights: The Department of Handloom and Textiles, Government of Uttar Pradesh shall appoint a team of professionals as Project Management Agency (PMA) for policy implementation and supporting the department in publicizing the policy benefits among national / international investors, brands and other stakeholders and providing prompt support to the investors.
data.additional_info: Preference will be given to those resident/s, in purchase of land from UPSIDA, GIDA, NOIDA, GREATER NOIDA or other authorities, to start new employment.
data.checklist_info_a:
1.Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
2. Certificate of Incorporation/ Partnership deed/Partnership registration/ Co- operative society 
registration. 
3.KYC Details
data.checklist_info_d: Picup Bhawan, Block A, 4th Floor, Lucknow, UP, 0522-3117976, info@investup.org.in
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing All Textile and Garmenting Units - All Entities - Uttarpradesh - All MSMES & All Non MSMEs
